Posts.Content: Hi everyone I don,t know what this is really but I hurt in my chest breast area and under my right arm the muscles or soreand down my right side to the end of the ribcage..Just a sore dull hurt in my breast.Had a stress test and and ecocardyigram done a couple months ago doc said heart is fine but somethings not right.I feel so bad most the time .I just lost my brother to Melanoma Aug.31st 06 and I,m kinda scared.Anyone know what it could be ?
Posts.Title: Chest/ breast or something

Posts.Content: Thanks for the advice really feel bad here.
Posts.Title: Chest/ breast or something

Posts.Content: I just don't know what to tell you all I know is my chest/breast area is sore this morning .Under my left arm is hurting just a thobbing feeling and the veins or sore .My hubby hugged me this morning a strong grip and it hurt me .But I didn't tell him .Under my breast is sore along the ribs.I guess I gotta break down annd go to the Doc. but don,t want to go and nothing be wrong and look stupid .Good luck to you hope you find out whats wrong with us .
